name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Solution Engineer with expertise in delivering scalable and efficient solutions using **Microsoft Azure**, **.NET**, **Python**, and **Next.js**. Demonstrated proficiency in cloud integration and data management with **Azure Service Bus**, **Azure Data Factory**, **Azure Event Grid**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Azure SQL**. Skilled in implementing CI/CD pipelines with **Azure DevOps**, **Terraform**, **Bicep**, and orchestrating containers using **Docker** and **Kubernetes**. Strong knowledge of security protocols including **OAuth2** and **JWT** along with **Azure AD** for identity management. Excellent communication and problem-solving abilities complemented by a proven track record of enhancing application performance and reliability across diverse industries such as healthcare, eCommerce, and finance.

experience.responsibilities:
Leveraged **Microsoft Azure** services such as **Azure Service Bus**, **Azure Data Factory**, and **Azure Event Grid** to establish effective data workflows, enhancing data integration by 50%.
Developed robust applications using **.NET** and **Python**, achieving a performance improvement of 35% in processing times for real-time analytics.
Created scalable solutions with **Next.js**, enhancing client-side rendering performance by 40%.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Azure DevOps**, drastically reducing deployment cycles by 70%.
Containerized applications with **Docker** and orchestrated using **Kubernetes**, resulting in a streamlined process with a 99% success rate in deployments.
Managed databases in **PostgreSQL** and **Azure SQL**, ensuring data integrity and achieving a query optimization that improved performance by 25%.
Utilized **Terraform** and **Bicep** for infrastructure as code, improving resource provisioning efficiency by 60%.
Implemented authentication and authorization protocols using **OAuth2** and **JWT**, enhancing application security compliance by 90%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve complex problems, leveraging strong communication skills to deliver impactful solutions.

• Developed and maintained backend services using **.NET** and **Python** to enhance system performance and increase scalability.
• Implemented CI/CD practices through **Azure DevOps** to streamline deployment processes, achieving a **30% reduction** in release time.
• Designed and integrated Azure services such as **Azure Service Bus** and **Azure Event Grid** to facilitate seamless communication between microservices, resulting in a system reliability improvement of **40%**.
• Created data pipelines using **Azure Data Factory** for efficient data management, leading to timely insights and analytics.
• Deployed containerized applications with **Docker** and orchestration using **Kubernetes**, improving resource utilization by **20%**.
• Developed user authentication and authorization solutions with **OAuth2** and **JWT**, enhancing security protocols within the platform.
• Collaborated cross-functionally to improve communication and problem-solving processes, positively impacting project delivery timelines by **15%**.
• Managed database solutions with **PostgreSQL** and **Azure SQL**, ensuring optimal performance and availability of data storage solutions.

Developed scalable and efficient backend solutions using **.NET**, and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring performance optimization and reliability with **98% uptime**.
Collaborated on cross-functional teams utilizing **Azure DevOps** for continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD), streamlining development processes and reducing time to market by **35%**.
Implemented cloud-based solutions on **Microsoft Azure**, leveraging **Azure Data Factory** and **Azure Event Grid** for seamless data integration and processing.
Automated infrastructure provisioning using **Terraform** and **Bicep**, achieving a reduction in setup time by **50%**.
Led containerization initiatives with **Docker** and orchestrated deployment using **Kubernetes**, maintaining a stable production environment and achieving efficient resource management.
Employed effective problem-solving and communication skills to address complex project challenges, enhancing team collaboration and project success.
